definition: to go down to the fields/to get up from bed/to leave one's sickbed/to be born
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: One day he saw a farmer working in the field. The farmer was working very hard under the hot sun.
sentences.chinese: 一天，他看到一位農民叔叔在炎熱的天氣下地幹活兒。

sentences.english: Besides working in the fields, they also tend a rubber plantation and orchard.
sentences.chinese: 他們除了下地幹活之外，還照管橡膠園和果園。

sentences.english: To this day, she still cannot walk.
sentences.chinese: 直到今天她還無法下地走路。

sentences.english: They left for the fields, shouldering spades and hoes.
sentences.chinese: 他們扛起鐵鍬和鋤頭就下地了。

sentences.english: Despite old age, Grandpa still works in the field.
sentences.chinese: 儘管上了年紀，爺爺依然下地幹活。

sentences.english: She was walking that night and left the next day," Montgomery said.
sentences.chinese: 她當天夜裏就能下地行走，第二天就出院了。
今天下地幹活要用鐵耙了。

sentences.english: And clean neat, do not delay to work.
sentences.chinese: 等拾掇齊整了，還不耽誤下地幹活。

sentences.english: Pleased as man with man to dwell.
We have already laid our melons down.
sentences.chinese: 我們已經把瓜種下地了。

sentences.english: In the busy season the village looked deserted when all the peasants had gone to the fields.
sentences.chinese: 農忙季節，人都下地了，村子裏顯得空蕩蕩的。

sentences.english: In a hurry, Myra drops her bag.
sentences.chinese: 匆忙中，瑪拉的包掉下地。

sentences.english: It snowed and snowed until the snow seemed permanent.
sentences.chinese: 雪下呀下地，雪好像成了永恆不變的了。

sentences.english: At dawn they started off to work in the fields.
sentences.chinese: 天一亮他們就下地幹活去了。

sentences.english: Although the weather was not so good, we still went to work in the field ms usual.
sentences.chinese: 雖然天氣不太好，但我們還是照常下地幹活了。

sentences.english: China to crack down on official partying to fight corrupt…
sentences.chinese: 中國擬採納辦法峻厲辦法衝擊糜爛下地官方宴會。

definition: to land/to touch the ground/also pr. [zhuo2 di4]
to step on/to tread on/to wear (shoes)/(slang) to dump (sb)/Taiwan pr. [deng4]
to lift/to raise/(of two or more persons) to carry
to walk around/to move about/to stretch one's legs/to go for a walk/to be mobile (e.g. after an illness)/to visit one another/to pay a visit (go to the toilet)
place/locality/edge of a field/lower margin of a page
